clickToReply.name: Click to reply (1.8)
clickToReply.description: Click on the name in any private message to quickly reply.

preventCommandFailure.name: Block incorrect commands (1.8 + Cloud)
preventCommandFailure.description: Block mistyped commands. e.g. 7p h or 7msg

betterIgnoreList.name: Better ignore list (1.8)
betterIgnoreList.description: Show ignore list in a easier to read format.

showPrefixInDisplayName.name: Prefix colors above player (1.8 + Cloud)
showPrefixInDisplayName.description: Show the names above players in their correct prefix colors.

plotChatRight.name: Plot chat right
plotChatRight.description: Display plot chat messages in the 2nd chat.

privateChatRight.name: Private messages right
privateChatRight.description: Display private messages in the 2nd chat.

privateChatSound.name: Private message sound
privateChatSound.description: Play sound when you receive a private message.

realnamePosition.name: Show realname
realnamePosition.description: Show /realname in the 2nd or in both chats.

highlightMentions.name: Highlight mentions
highlightMentions.description: Highlight messages where your name is mentioned in color.

mentionColor.name: Mention color
mentionColor.description: Color in which messages where your name is mentioned are highlighted.

mentionSound.name: Mention sound
mentionSound.description: Sound which is played when somebody mentions your name in the chat.

highlightTPA.name: Highlight TPA messages
highlightTPA.description: Hicghlight TPA and TPAHERE messages in different colors.

itemRemoverChatRight.name: ItemRemover right
itemRemoverChatRight.description: Display ItemRemover messages in the 2nd chat.

itemRemoverLastTimeHover.name: ItemRemover timestamp
itemRemoverLastTimeHover.description: Show timestamp when hovering a ItemRemover message.

itemRemoverNotification.name: ItemRemover notification
itemRemoverNotification.description: Show ItemRemover notifications on the upper right part of the screen.

mobRemoverChatRight.name: MobRemover right
mobRemoverChatRight.description: Display MobRemover messages in the 2nd chat.

mobRemoverLastTimeHover.name: MobRemover timestamp
mobRemoverLastTimeHover.description: Show timestamp when hovering a MobRemover message.

mobRemoverNotification.name: MobRemover notification
mobRemoverNotification.description: Show MobRemover notifications on the upper right part of the screen.

hideVoteMessages.name: Hide vote messages
hideVoteMessages.description: Hide vote messages from other players in the chat.

hideNewsMessages.name: Hide news
hideNewsMessages.description: Hide GrieferGames News in the chat.

hideBlankLines.name: Remove blank lines
hideBlankLines.description: Remove blank lines in the chat and prevent /clearchat.

hideSupremeBlankLines.name: Remove Supreme blank lines
hideSupremeBlankLines.description: Remove blank lines from Supreme players. e.g. »

ampClantagEnabled.name: Replace magic clan tags
ampClantagEnabled.description: Replace magic letters in clan tags with a readable font.

ampEnabled.name: Replace magic prefix
ampEnabled.description: Make names of players with magic prefix readable and mark them.

ampReplacement.name: New chat prefix
ampReplacement.description: Prefix that is used to mark players with a magic prefix.

showChatTime.name: Display chat time
showChatTime.description: Add the current time to all chat messages.

chatTimeAfterMessage.name: Chat time after message
chatTimeAfterMessage.description: Add the chat time after the message.

chatTimeFormat.name: Chat time format
chatTimeFormat.description: Format used for the chat time.

logTransactions.name: Log transactions
logTransactions.description: Log all transactions in a log file.

openTransactionsFile.name: Transactions file
openTransactionsFile.description: Open the transactions log file in your text editor.

payAchievement.name: Payment notification
payAchievement.description: Show notifications for incoming payments on the upper right part of the screen.

payHighlight.name: Highlight payments
payHighlight.description: Mark verified payments in the chat.

fakeMoneyWarning.name: Warn about fake money
fakeMoneyWarning.description: Warn against fake payments with a Supreme status.

bankAchievement.name: Bank notification
bankAchievement.description: Show notifications for bank transactions on the upper right part of the screen.

loadBoostersOnJoin.name: Load booster on join
loadBoostersOnJoin.description: Auto load boosters when you join the server.

hideBoosterMenu.name: Hide booster menu
hideBoosterMenu.description: Hide the manu of the /booster command. Only show overview in the chat.

autoPortal.name: Auto portal (1.8)
autoPortal.description: Directly join to the portal room.

autoColor.name: Auto chatcolor (1.8)
autoColor.description: Automatically adds the set colorcode before every message that you send. (Can cause problems with commands of other addons or mods.)

autoColorCloud.name: Auto chatcolor (Cloud)
autoColorCloud.description: Automatically adds the set colorcode before every message that you send. (Can cause problems with commands of other addons or mods.)

autoColorCloudColor.name: Chatcolor (Cloud)
autoColorCloudColor.description: Color, in that you will be writing on the Cloud.

colorGradiantCloud.name: Chatcolorgradiant (Cloud)
colorGradiantCloud.description: Adds a color gradiant between to hexcolorcodes, like '##ff0000' and '##00ff00' in the message

afkTime.name: AFK after (in min) (1.8 + Cloud)
afkTime.description: Timer after which you will be marked as AFK.

afkNick.name: Nick when AFK (1.8 + Cloud)
afkNick.description: Automatically set a nickname, when you ware detected as AFK and remove after you are back.

afkMsgReply.name: Reply to private messages (1.8 + Cloud)
afkMsgReply.description: Automatically reply to private messages with a predefined text while you are AFK.

afkMsgText.name: Reply text (1.8 + Cloud)
afkMsgText.description: Text that should be replied to private messages, while you are AFK.

labyChatShowSubServerEnabled.name: Show CityBuild in LabyChat (1.8 + Cloud)
labyChatShowSubServerEnabled.description: Let all your friends see your current CityBuild in the LabyChat.

discordShowSubServerEnabled.name: Show CityBuild in Discord (1.8 + Cloud)
discordShowSubServerEnabled.description: Let all your friends on Discord see your current CityBuild.

messages.advancedChatWarning: Advanced Chat is currently disabled. This feature is required by the addon to work properly. Please go to LabyMod Settings --> Ingame and enable Advanced Chat.
messages.fakeMoney: The payment from {player} of {amount} has been detected as fake money.
messages.afkMessage: You are marked as AFK now.
messages.afkBackMessage: You are marked as back now.
messages.commandFailure: Did you make a mistake? If not, send the message again.

notifications.generalError: An error occurred, please check the chat.

update.available: An update to version {version} is available
update.ready: On the next restart the addon will be updated to version {version}

bank.title: Bank
bank.deposit: You deposited {amount} into your bank account.
bank.withdraw: You have withdrawn {amount} from your bank account.

griefergames.name: GrieferGames
griefergames.description: Display GrieferGames related information directly on your screen.
